cause.description:
Global Angels is an organization that helps rescue young girls that are forced into prostitution. They are saved and given counseling and job training to try and resume a happier life again. There are three ways that you can help:
1. Buy a glow-in-the-dark braclet that has 'everyone can be an Angel' imprinted on it at globalangels.org .
2. Sign the petition against sexual slavery and human trafficking at stopthetraffik.org .
3. Donate to the International Justice Mission's Loose Change to Loosen Chains campaign here or at ijm.org .
1. Give these young girls a happier, healthier life.
cause.mission: Our mission is to help save young girls around the world that are being kidnapped and forced into prostitution.
